sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SULTANHISSAR, a village of Anatolia, in Asiatic Turkey, situated near the remains of the ancient Greek city of Tralles, and twenty-three miles east of Scalanova. On

the top of an adjacent hill are found traces of some ancient buildings, particularly a temple and a theatre, with fifty rows of seats. Some remains of a magnificent portico are also seen, with two rows of pillars.
